requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500k (4 core 3.3 GHz) or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 (4 core 3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 (4 GB) or AMD R9 290X (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 1.8 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 3GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. Webcam tracking requires webcam.

  • Storage: 6 GB available space
